mapper.insert:
insert ignore into mountain ( mountain_code, mountain_name, mountain_phone, mountain_hight, mountain_content, mountain_address ) values
( #{mountain.mountain_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mountain.mountain_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mountain.mountain_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mountain.mountain_hight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mountain.mountain_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mountain.mountain_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert ignore into mountain_path ( climb_path_num, mountain_code, climb_path_XY, climb_path_difficult, climb_path_uptime, climb_path_downtime, climb_path_length, climb_path_name ) values
( #{path.climb_path_num}, #{path.mountain_code}, #{path.climb_path_XY,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{path.climb_path_difficult}, #{path.climb_path_uptime}, #{path.climb_path_downtime}, #{path.climb_path_length}, #{path.climb_path_name} )
mapper.select:
select distinct(m.mountain_code), m.mountain_name, m.mountain_phone, m.mountain_hight, m.mountain_content, m.mountain_address, m.mountain_img_src from mountain m, mountain_path p where m.mountain_code = p.mountain_code
and m.mountain_code > #{lastmountain}
and (m.mountain_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by m.mountain_code limit 6
select distinct(m.mountain_code), m.mountain_name from mountain m, mountain_path p where m.mountain_code = p.mountain_code and m.mountain_img_src is null

select m.mountain_code, m.mountain_name, m.mountain_phone, m.mountain_hight, m.mountain_content, m.mountain_address, m.mountain_img_src, p.climb_path_num, p.climb_path_XY, p.climb_path_difficult, p.climb_path_uptime, p.climb_path_downtime, p.climb_path_length, p.climb_path_name from mountain m, mountain_path p where m.mountain_code = p.mountain_code and m.mountain_code = #{mountain_code}
